name: Rave'n'Cat
description:
Rave'N'Cat - submission to Madora Game Jam 2022.
It is a platformer with a fraction of puzzle, where you need to get through many challenges to steal a valuable item. Collect coins, solve puzzles, think ahead and be patient - one error and you will start from scratch!

CONTROLS

  • move - WASD or arrows
  • jump/detach - SPACE
  • interact - left mouse click

NANO

Integration is implemented in form of a swap for in-game currency (coins). It is a free-to-play form of a gameplay, as you can aquire coins anyway while playing. Coins can be used then to have fun with slot machine and (with some luck) win upgrades.

RECENT CHANGES

  • Madora module now works in windows version (still problem with web)
  • fixed not being able to loose when playing slot machine
  • added one skin for each character, try to get three diamonds in slot machine
  • progress is now saved (coins, skins, etc)
  • unlocking new levels still not available, slot machine gives many coins instead


CREDITS

  • all graphics, code and music by Idle Bum (used our previous music works, considering original OST in future :D)
  • all sounds are from various free websites.

Enjoy playing!

Idle Bum (Daniil & Polina)
